visual_prompt: Two photos: one showing a teenage student working in a café, another showing students studying together in a library

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Lucas

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Lucas

turns.speaker: Emma

turns.speaker: Lucas

topic: Is social media good or bad for friendships?

turns.speaker: Emma
